Set-up steps for Logstash and Kibana.

Monitoring your application..

Prerequisite

Elasticsearch - FullText search engine.

Logstash - Store log data and indexing.

Get insights of input, filters and output: -

Kibana - Awesome visual dashboard.

Download ELK

Checkout Products of Elastic

Step1: Install Elasticsearch and automatically start during bootup.

Step2: Install Logstash and download all the plugins and their set-up.

Step3: Download Kibana files.

Complete information https://www.elastic.co/downloads

Ruby Gem

gem 'logstasher' https://github.com/shadabahmed/logstasher

Configure the Rails environment to be monitored accordingly

Provides an additional logger for your application in JSON format, which will be feed as input to logstash and visualised from Kibana interface.

Dynamic way of table setting

In case when table is dynamically set by user. In class you must have to use 

self.abstract_class = true
attr_protected
